name: Air Fryer Tajin® Apple Chips
author: Yoly
summary: A healthy snack of Tajin®-flavored apple chips that is tasty, low in calories, and easy to prepare. Serve in place of regular chips. Kids love these.
ingredients: ½ tablespoon chile-lime seasoning (such as Tajin®), or more to taste
directions: Preheat the air fryer to 180 degrees F (82 degrees C)
Thinly slice apple with a mandolin
Place as many apple slices in the air fryer basket as you can, making sure they do not touch
Cook in the air fryer for 12 minutes, working in batches if necessary
Pull the basket out, turn apple slices over, and cook until lightly browned on the other side, 8 to 12 minutes more
